title: Hampton Inn Gaffney Offers Convenient Lodging for South Carolina Peach Festival
text: Hampton Inn Gaffney Offers Convenient Lodging for South Carolina Peach Festival Hampton Inn Gaffney SC offers convenient lodging for the 2015 South Carolina Peach Festival July 9-19. We look forward to welcoming guests attending the South Carolina Peach Festival. GAFFNEY, SC, July 07,   The Hampton Inn Gaffney South Carolina Hotel offers convenient lodging for the 2015 South Carolina Peach Festival. Gaffney will host a variety of festival events from July 9-19. Highlights of the festival will include a parade, concerts, arts and crafts show, golf tournament, tractor pull, 5K and 10K runs, peach dessert contest, and beauty pageant. The South Carolina Peach Festival is one of the most popular Upstate summer events. "We look forward to welcoming guests attending the South Carolina Peach Festival," comments Anil Modi, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Gaffney. "This family friendly festival offers something for everyone to enjoy," continues Modi. The award winning Hampton Inn is a popular lodging choice among hotels in Gaffney SC . Non-smoking guest rooms feature Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds and free high speed Internet access. The complimentary Hampton On the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is a delicious way to start the day. A Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bag is a convenient option on weekday mornings. Hampton guests can relax and unwind after a busy day at the outdoor pool and patio. Other property amenities include a 24-hour business center and guest laundry facility. The Hampton Inn is next door to the Gaffney Premium Outlets, with some of the best shopping in the Upstate region. Nearby historic attractions include King's Mountain National Military Park and Cowpens National Battlefield. The Hampton Inn Gaffney recently received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package, with late checkout. AAA and senior rates are available. HHonors members can earn Double Points or Double Miles for their stays through August 31, 2015. For more information about the South Carolina Peach Festival, visit http://scpeachfestival.net . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn Gaffney SC Hotel , call 864-206-0011 or visit online at www.HAMPTONINNGAFFNEY.com .About Hampton Inn Gaffney The Hampton Inn Gaffney Hotel offers a welcome place to rest when you're on the road. Business travelers and vacationers alike will be delighted by the modern conveniences and outstanding service this Gaffney hotel includes. If you've ever wanted to experience true Southern hospitality, you're sure to find it here. The Hampton Inn Gaffney hotel is conveniently located off I-85 next to Hamrick's Department Store and Gaffney Premium Outlets. This property offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.
